review: I don't use this often -and when I go to use it again - it does not seem to remember its connection - and dropped a lot. When it works it is fine. I found it in a store at a lower price than online - but I bought it here on amazon.I have heard more devices are coming out on the market that my have better connectivity and ease of use.But since my use of this is infrequent - I will probably slog along with this one until I hear of something else that does this function that is compelling - and at a reasonable price.
